title: 'An act of sabotage': how Sir Oliver Letwin took control and denied Boris Johnson his super Saturday
text:
“Let’s call this what it is,” said one furious Downing Street insider. “An act of sabotage.”

Having persuaded a majority of MPs to say they would vote for his Brexit deal, Boris Johnson had one hand on the ultimate prize today, only for Sir Oliver Letwin to snatch it from his grasp at the last moment.

Sir Oliver, the former Tory minister who simply cannot resist intervening in history, ensured that Britain, and the Prime Minister, will have to wait yet again for clarity on whether the UK will leave the EU on Oct 31, or at all.

“The public will be appalled by this,” said a Downing Street spokesman. “MPs have just voted for another pointless delay.”

Sir Oliver, a man who continues to insist he...
description: “Let’s call this what it is,” said one furious Downing Street insider.
